Package io.anserini.collection

Class WashingtonPostCollection

java.lang.Object
io.anserini.collection.DocumentCollection<WashingtonPostCollection.Document>
io.anserini.collection.WashingtonPostCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<FileSegment<WashingtonPostCollection.Document>>
public class WashingtonPostCollection
extends DocumentCollection<WashingtonPostCollection.Document>
An instance of the TREC Washington Post Corpus. The collection contains 608,180 news articles and blog posts from January 2012 through August 2017, stored in JSON format. The collection is 1.5GB compressed, 5.9GB uncompressed.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  WashingtonPostCollection.Document
    A document from the TREC Washington Post Corpus.
    static class  WashingtonPostCollection.Segment
    A file containing multiple documents from the TREC Washington Post Corpus.
